statements: UPDATE segment_users SET user_name = 'John Doe', behavior_score = 80, email = 'john.doe@example.com', interests = 'Sports' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE segment_users SET email = 'jane.smith@example.com', behavior_score = 90, interests = 'Music', user_name = 'Jane Smith' WHERE user_id = 102;
UPDATE segment_users SET interests='reading, hiking' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE segment_users SET behavior_score=80, email='updated@email.com' WHERE user_name='John Doe'
UPDATE segment_users SET user_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_efforts SET strategy_name = 'Email Campaign' WHERE user_id = 2 AND effort_date = '2022-06-10';
UPDATE segment_users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_interests = 'Sports, Music' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE marketing_efforts SET strategy_name = 'Social Media Marketing', effort_description = 'Engage users on social platforms', effort_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE user_id = 105;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, interests = 'Reading, Traveling' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-05-01', end_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, interests = 'Music, Travel' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE behaviors SET behavior_type = 'Active', timestamp = '2022-09-15 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE UserProfiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE Interests SET interest_name='Music' WHERE interest_id=3;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith', email='alice.smith@example.com' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE UserInterests SET interest_id=3 WHERE user_id=2
UPDATE users SET username = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE behavior SET behavior_type = 'Login', behavior_timestamp = NOW() WHERE behavior_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET username = 'johnnydoe', email = 'johnny.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_segments SET segment_name = 'New Segment' WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'johnnydoe');
